title: Pantheon influence of dome on later arch

content.question: The form of the Pantheon was influential on later architectural development in part because the

choices.label: oculus provided an affordable and efficient way to fully illuminate the interior
high-domed rotunda could accommodate a large number of congregational worshipers
sacred geometry of circles within squares was believed to protect against earthquakes
raised platform made the building easy to see from a great distance

content.answer: high-domed rotunda could accommodate a large number of congregational worshipers
